item.title: Config: Run shell script on login
item.description: Sometimes, I got frustrated with the fact that my SSH keys were cleared from agents after rebooting. As a result, I had to manually add those keys to agents every time my computer restarted (although it’s not occasional)… It’s best to automate such tasks - I thought. So, I asked “how to run a shell script on login?”. And here are some solutions
